objects.specification: A large, flat rectangular plane that serves as the booth floor. It has dimensions of 6 meters in width and 4 meters in depth, with a thin profile. The surface has a smooth, matte finish in a neutral light gray tone, edge details are minimal to maintain a clean, professional look.

A tall, rectangular vertical panel forming the back wall of the booth. It is 6 meters wide and 3 meters high, with a thin thickness. The surface is smooth and painted in a neutral off-white tone. Edges are sharp with no decorative trim, presenting a minimalist finish.

A tall, rectangular vertical panel forming the left side wall of the booth. It is 4 meters deep and 3 meters high, with a thin thickness. The surface is smooth and painted in a neutral off-white tone. Edges are sharp with no decorative trim, presenting a minimalist finish.

A tall, rectangular vertical panel forming the right side wall of the booth. It is 4 meters deep and 3 meters high, with a thin thickness. The surface is smooth and painted in a neutral off-white tone. Edges are sharp with no decorative trim, presenting a minimalist finish.

A rectangular reception counter with dimensions 1.5 meters wide, 0.6 meters deep, and 1 meter high. It features a flat countertop with a subtle overhang, a solid base, and a smooth matte finish in a medium neutral gray. The design is minimalist and functional, with clean straight edges.

A tall, narrow rectangular display stand measuring 0.5 meters in width, 0.5 meters in depth, and 2 meters in height. It has a sturdy rectangular base and a clean, smooth finish. The stand’s color is vibrant and glossy red to draw attention. The edges are crisp and angular, emphasizing a modern aesthetic.

A tall, narrow rectangular display stand measuring 0.5 meters in width, 0.5 meters in depth, and 2 meters in height. It has a sturdy rectangular base and a clean, smooth finish. The stand’s color is vibrant and glossy green to draw attention. The edges are crisp and angular, emphasizing a modern aesthetic.

The stand’s color is vibrant and glossy yellow to draw attention. The edges are crisp and angular, emphasizing a modern aesthetic.

A small round cafe-style table with a circular tabletop 0.8 meters in diameter and 0.75 meters high. The tabletop is smooth with a matte finish in white. The table is supported by a single central cylindrical pedestal base, also in the same finish. Overall, it conveys a simple, contemporary look.

A modern visitor chair with a seat width of 0.45 meters, depth of 0.45 meters, and a backrest height of 0.9 meters. The chair has a smooth, slightly curved seat and backrest, supported by four slender legs. The finish is a dark neutral gray with minimal detailing, suitable for casual seating.

A decorative rectangular banner made from a thin plane, measuring 1 meter in width and 1.5 meters in length. It features vibrant, eye-catching patterns or graphics across the surface. The edges of the banner are straight and crisp. The material appears slightly glossy, suitable for hanging displays.

A small pendant light fixture with a spherical shade approximately 0.2 meters in diameter. It is suspended by a thin cable and finished in a soft warm yellow glow. The surface of the shade is smooth and emits a soft, diffused light, creating a welcoming ambiance.

A decorative potted plant with a leafy foliage arrangement. The overall plant width is 0.5 meters and height is 1 meter. It sits in a simple cylindrical planter pot with a neutral matte finish. The foliage is lush and vibrant green, adding a natural accent to the space.

A small promotional shelf unit with dimensions 0.6 meters wide, 0.3 meters deep, and 1.5 meters high. It consists of multiple flat shelf surfaces supported by thin vertical supports. The finish is a medium neutral gray with a matte texture. The design is minimalist and functional, suitable for displaying brochures or materials.

A festive helium balloon with an approximately spherical shape 0.3 meters in diameter. It has a glossy surface in a bright, vivid color. Each balloon is attached to a slim tether with a small weight at its base. The overall look is playful and celebratory.
